title: Memory Fragment 1
text: So cold… it feels like when we played outside… with someone… wasn’t it?

title: Memory Fragment 2
text: This stick… I think we used to pretend with it… but who was holding it with me?

title: The Final Memory
text: These shiny pieces… I broke something once… and someone licked it, hehe… who was that again?

title: Memory Fragment 3
text: It’s warm and pretty… I remember laughing in the garden… with… um… someone small.
